Interface GameStates

All Known Implementing Classes:
Constants, GameActivity, GameModel, GameStart, GameTimerThread, GameViewModel, Question, QuestionDetail, ServerWaiting
public interface GameStates
The GameStates interface defines the various states a game can be in.
